errors.english: I'm going to speak with you
errors.description: 'with you' should translate to 'contigo' or 'con usted', not 'con personas' (with people)
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: voy a hablar contigo

errors.english: I'm going to speak Spanish with you tomorrow
errors.spanish: voy a hablar español con personas mañana
errors.description: 'with you' should translate to 'contigo' or 'con usted', not 'con personas' (with people)
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: voy a hablar español contigo mañana

errors.english: I want talking
errors.description: After 'want', English requires infinitive 'to talk' or gerund in specific contexts, but not bare gerund 'talking'

errors.english: I'm going to start talking with you tomorrow
errors.spanish: voy a comenzar a hablar con personas mañana
errors.description: 'with you' should translate to 'contigo' or 'con usted', not 'con personas' (with people)
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: voy a comenzar a hablar contigo mañana

errors.english: I'm going to start soon
errors.description: 'comenzar a' requires a verb following it. 'pronto' is an adverb and cannot follow 'a'. Should be 'voy a comenzar pronto' without the second 'a'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: voy a comenzar pronto

errors.english: I want to speak with you soon
errors.description: 'with you' should translate to 'contigo' or 'con usted', not 'con personas' (with people)
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: quiero hablar contigo pronto

errors.english: I'm not going to speak with you tomorrow
errors.spanish: no voy a hablar con personas mañana
errors.description: 'with you' should translate to 'contigo' or 'con usted', not 'con personas' (with people)
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: no voy a hablar contigo mañana

errors.english: help me speak
errors.description: In Spanish, 'ayudar' requires the preposition 'a' before an infinitive: 'ayudarme a hablar'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: ayudarme a hablar

errors.english: are you going to help me learn
errors.description: In Spanish, 'ayudar' requires the preposition 'a' before an infinitive: 'ayudarme a aprender'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: vas a ayudarme a aprender

errors.english: are you going to help me remember
errors.description: In Spanish, 'ayudar' requires the preposition 'a' before an infinitive: 'ayudarme a recordar'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: vas a ayudarme a recordar

errors.english: are you going to help me speak Spanish
errors.description: In Spanish, 'ayudar' requires the preposition 'a' before an infinitive: 'ayudarme a hablar'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: vas a ayudarme a hablar español

errors.english: you want to help me learn his name
errors.description: In Spanish, 'ayudar' requires the preposition 'a' before an infinitive: 'ayudarme a aprender'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: quieres ayudarme a aprender su nombre

errors.english: are you going to help me start talking
errors.spanish: vas a ayudarme comenzar a hablar
errors.description: In Spanish, 'ayudar' requires the preposition 'a' before an infinitive: 'ayudarme a comenzar'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: vas a ayudarme a comenzar a hablar

errors.english: she wants to help me remember the answer
errors.spanish: ella quiere ayudarme recordar la respuesta
errors.description: In Spanish, 'ayudar' requires the preposition 'a' before an infinitive: 'ayudarme a recordar'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: ella quiere ayudarme a recordar la respuesta

errors.english: are you going to help me learn before
errors.spanish: vas a ayudarme aprender antes de que
errors.description: In Spanish, 'ayudar' requires the preposition 'a' before an infinitive: 'ayudarme a aprender'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: vas a ayudarme a aprender antes de que

errors.english: I like speaking Spanish with you
errors.spanish: me gusta hablar español con personas
errors.description: 'with you' should translate to 'contigo' or 'con usted', not 'con personas' (with people)
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: me gusta hablar español contigo

errors.english: I want feeling
errors.description: After 'want', English requires infinitive 'to feel', not gerund 'feeling'

errors.english: I like feeling as if I'm able to remember
errors.spanish: me gusta sentir como si estuviera poder recordar
errors.description: After 'estuviera' (subjunctive), the verb 'poder' should be in gerund form 'pudiendo' or the construction should use the subjunctive 'pudiera recordar'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: me gusta sentir como si pudiera recordar

errors.english: feeling as if I'm nearly able to speak
errors.spanish: sentir como si estuviera casi poder hablar
errors.description: After 'estuviera' (subjunctive), should use 'pudiera hablar' not 'poder hablar'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: sentir como si pudiera casi hablar

errors.english: ready to speak
errors.description: In Spanish, 'preparado' requires 'para' before an infinitive: 'preparado para hablar'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: preparado para hablar

errors.english: as if I'm nearly ready to speak
errors.spanish: como si estuviera casi preparado hablar
errors.description: In Spanish, 'preparado' requires 'para' before an infinitive: 'preparado para hablar'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: como si estuviera casi preparado para hablar

errors.english: you are ready to speak Spanish
errors.description: In Spanish, 'preparado' requires 'para' before an infinitive: 'preparado para hablar'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: estás preparado para hablar español

errors.english: I like feeling as if I'm nearly ready to speak
errors.spanish: me gusta sentir como si estuviera casi preparado hablar
errors.description: In Spanish, 'preparado' requires 'para' before an infinitive: 'preparado para hablar'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: me gusta sentir como si estuviera casi preparado para hablar

errors.english: I want to go
errors.description: 'quiero' takes an infinitive directly without 'para': 'quiero ir'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: quiero ir

errors.english: I have to go
errors.description: 'tener que' takes an infinitive directly without 'para': 'tenga que ir'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: tenga que ir

errors.english: I want taking
errors.description: After 'want', English requires infinitive 'to take', not gerund 'taking'

errors.english: I'm going to taking
errors.description: After 'going to', English requires infinitive 'take' without 'to', not gerund 'taking'

errors.english: I'm not going to taking
errors.description: After 'going to', English requires infinitive 'take' without 'to', not gerund 'taking'

errors.english: I'm not going to taking too much time
errors.spanish: no voy a tomar demasiado tiempo
errors.description: After 'going to', English requires infinitive 'take' without 'to', not gerund 'taking'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I'm not going to take too much time

errors.english: I'm going to taking too much time
errors.description: After 'going to', English requires infinitive 'take' without 'to', not gerund 'taking'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I'm going to take too much time

errors.english: she wants taking too much time
errors.description: After 'want', English requires infinitive 'to take', not gerund 'taking'
errors.suggested_fix_english: she wants to take too much time

errors.english: I don't like taking too much time to learn
errors.spanish: no me gusta tomar demasiado tiempo aprender
errors.description: In Spanish, need preposition 'para' before the infinitive: 'tiempo para aprender'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: no me gusta tomar demasiado tiempo para aprender

errors.english: I'm going to taking time to learn more
errors.spanish: voy a tomar tiempo para aprender más
errors.description: After 'going to', English requires infinitive 'take' without 'to', not gerund 'taking'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I'm going to take time to learn more

errors.english: I'm going to taking time to answer
errors.spanish: voy a tomar tiempo para responder
errors.description: After 'going to', English requires infinitive 'take' without 'to', not gerund 'taking'
errors.suggested_fix_english: I'm going to take time to answer

errors.english: start as soon as you can
errors.spanish: comenzar a tan pronto como puedas
errors.description: 'comenzar a' requires a verb following it. 'tan pronto como puedas' is an adverbial phrase and cannot follow 'a'. Should be 'comenzar tan pronto como puedas' without the 'a'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: comenzar tan pronto como puedas

errors.english: I'm going to start as soon as you can
errors.spanish: voy a comenzar a tan pronto como puedas
errors.description: 'comenzar a' requires a verb following it. Should be 'voy a comenzar tan pronto como puedas' without the second 'a'
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: voy a comenzar tan pronto como puedas
